author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Update some of the scenarios so that the no-gap solution for V18 and beyond scenarios have no overlap issues

#### PR validation:

Tested using g4Overlap checks

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx364O Update some of the scenarios so that the no-gap solution for V18 and beyond scenarios have no overlap issues
